posts.title: Toca Life World: Get Started?
posts.description: the game of Toca Life is the new mega-app that connects all Toca Life apps into one. You can create your own world and play out any story you like. You can be a star in your own sci-fi movie, design a house fit for a sloth, or just...
posts.written:
the game of Toca Life is the new mega-app that connects all Toca Life apps into one
. You can create your own world and play out any story you like.
You can be a star in your own sci-fi movie, design a house fit for a sloth, or just hang out with your friends at the mall.
In this game, you’re your own boss! There are more than 90 locations to explore and over 500 characters to play with. Start building your world today :)

posts.title: Toca Life World: Available Features:
posts.description: In the game of Toca Life World, you're the boss. You have the ability to create stories, build characters and play the way you want. inside the game, there is...
posts.written:
In the game of Toca Life World, you're the boss. You have the ability to create stories, build characters and play the way you want. inside the game, there is a city that name is Bop City that you can visit which is a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover like the shopping mall and food court, the hairdresser, or even an apartment.
The game is free to download, and it lets new players explore eight different in-game locations, like a shopping mall, hairdresser.
Also, you can interact with 39 different characters. For instance, players can change a character hairstyle by going to the hairdresser's shop.

posts.title: Toca Life World: Can I use it on my android device?
posts.description: You can download FOR FREE Toca Life: World on the App Store, Google Play, and Amazon Appstore. The game Toca Life World is available online pretty much anywhere...
posts.written:
You can download FOR FREE Toca Life: World on the App Store, Google Play, and Amazon Appstore.
The game Toca Life World is available online pretty much anywhere. The game Toca Life World is a wonderful video game for all ages -- little kids and adults alike.

posts.title: Toca Life World: More Features:
posts.description: In the game of Toca Life World, you're the boss. You have the ability to create stories, build characters and play the way you want. inside the game, there is...
posts.written:
In the game of Toca Life World, you're the boss. You have the ability to create stories, build characters and play the way you want. inside the game, there is a city that name is Bop City that you can visit which is a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover like the shopping mall and food court, the hairdresser, or even an apartment.
The game is free to download, and it lets new players explore eight different in-game locations, like a shopping mall, hairdresser.
Also, you can interact with 39 different characters. For instance, players can change a character hairstyle by going to the hairdresser's shop.
